book_overview.premise: In Seattle, 9-year-old Aiden Park debugs more than code—when programming teaches him to read in meaningful chunks instead of isolated words, his ADHD becomes his superpower, and fluency becomes just another algorithm to optimize.

name_age_background.name: Aiden Park
name_age_background.background: Asian American (Korean) boy from single mom household in urban Seattle, ADHD affecting reading fluency
name_age_background.struggle: ADHD makes sustained reading difficult; choppy, word-by-word reading lacks phrasing and expression

personality_traits: Creative and passionate about their interest
Resilient when pursuing what they love
Kind-hearted but sometimes defensive about difficulties
protagonist_profile.growth_arc: Aiden reads robotically, one word at a time, gets exhausted quickly, discovers coding requires 'code fluency' to debug efficiently, practices phrasing through programming, masters reading fluency via code patterns, and creates a fluency training app

mentor_guide.personality: Patient, encouraging, sees potential in protagonist
mentor_guide.function: Provides explicit instruction and connects passion to skill

peer_group.description: 3-4 diverse classmates with varying learning profiles
peer_group.function: Normalize struggles, provide collaboration opportunities, show different paths

parallel_adult.starting_belief: Worried about protagonist's struggles, potentially fixed mindset

secondary_setting.primary: Urban Seattle apartment and coding bootcamp for kids
secondary_setting.secondary: Virtual coding arena where programs flow like rivers of readable text

setting_description.sensory_details: Vivid descriptions of creative spaces, technology, peer interactions
setting_description.memorable_elements: His programs only run when the code is 'read' with proper phrasing and expression—choppy reading causes syntax errors

contemporary_hook_integration.story_function: Aiden learns that code has rhythm and 'chunking' just like fluent reading—debugging requires reading code in meaningful phrases, not letter by letter
contemporary_hook_integration.why_kids_care: Connects to current interests and aspirations of 9-10 year olds in 2025
contemporary_hook_integration.authenticity: Protagonist's genuine passion, not a gimmick

progression: Discovery: Connection between passion and skill revealed
Practice: Deliberate work integrated with creative activity
educational_integration_plan.teaching_moments: Explicit instruction scenes with mentor, systematic skill building
educational_integration_plan.creative_activity_connection: Aiden learns that code has rhythm and 'chunking' just like fluent reading—debugging requires reading code in meaningful phrases, not letter by letter

chapter_summaries.key_events: Academic pressure increases, creative opportunity emerges

chapter_summaries.emotional_beats: Anxiety, determination to pursue passion anyway

chapter_summaries.title: Meeting the Mentor
chapter_summaries.key_events: Mentor/guide character introduced, sees connection protagonist doesn't yet see
chapter_summaries.skill_development: First explicit teaching moment, systematic introduction

chapter_summaries.title: The Connection

chapter_summaries.title: Small Victories
chapter_summaries.key_events: First breakthrough moment in skill development through creative work

chapter_summaries.title: Building Momentum (Midpoint)
chapter_summaries.key_events: Protagonist commits to deliberate practice, peers notice change

chapter_summaries.emotional_beats: Doubt, temptation to quit, support from mentor/peers

chapter_summaries.title: Deepening Understanding
chapter_summaries.key_events: Protagonist works through setback, adult parallel arc converges

chapter_summaries.title: The Big Project
chapter_summaries.skill_development: Skills fully integrated into creative work

chapter_summaries.title: Pressure and Stakes
chapter_summaries.key_events: Final challenges before culminating event, stakes at peak

chapter_summaries.title: The Breakthrough
chapter_summaries.key_events: Creative achievement demonstrates skill mastery, protagonist teaches others, adult arc resolves
chapter_summaries.skill_development: Mastery shown through authentic application, teaching role
chapter_summaries.emotional_beats: Pride, joy, connection, identity transformation complete

series_potential.protagonist_continuation: Could follow protagonist through more literacy skills and creative challenges
series_potential.peer_focus: Other characters in peer group could get their own stories
series_potential.skill_progression: Each book focuses on different SoR skill with different contemporary hook
series_potential.format: Standalone books that can be read in any order, shared universe
